A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie had it's flaws\, but overall\, I found it enjoyable. \n\nSo did Episode IV\, and Episode V\, and Episode VI. All of these movies have flaws\, and moments that make me gently shake my head. But there's that element of nostalgia mixed with solid acting (improved from the last movie) and excellent creativity. I believe the rating of 92% that I currently see on Rotten Tomatoes is correct- an A rating for sure\, but perhaps just an A-.
